Package umontreal.iro.lecuyer.randvarmulti

Class Summary
DirichletGen Extends RandomMultiVariateGen for a Dirichlet distribution.
MultiNormalGen Extends RandomMultiVariateGen for a multivariate normal distribution.
RandomMultiVariateGen This is the base class for all random variate generators over Rd, the d-dimensional space over the reals.
